fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, External Relations
eu_initiatives: As a coalition, we follow-up mainly on the EU development policies and its' implementation, including the MFF, the EDF, the ICD, the external impacts of the CAP. All parliamentary resolutions and actions regarding our theme as well.
organisation_name: Coalition of European Lobbies for Eastern African Pastoralism (CELEP)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Coalition of European Lobbies for Eastern African Pastoralism (CELEP) is an informal coalition of European members and East African partners focusing on communication, knowledge management and lobbying in favour of pastoralism in East Africa.  
 
Mission statement: 
 
The Members of the Coalition will work together to lobby their national governments, European Union (EU) bodies (Council, Parliament and Commission) as well as other policy-formulating bodies/ agencies in Europe (e.g. the European Headquarters of the United Nations in Geneva and the FAO in Rome) to explicitly recognise and support pastoralism (and the people who practise pastoralism: pastoralists) in the drylands of Eastern Africa.
relevant_communication: AEU Development policies, External policies such as trade, Common Agriculture Policy
